data.expected_result: You get removed from the Screen or the Option collapses, as you are unable to delete the Role twice
data.short_description: "Delete" text turns white/invisible in Channel Permission Overrides when the same role/user is removed by another user
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Channel that has a Permission Override with a Role or User - View this Override on your Phone (Edit Channel > Permissions > Role/User in question) and click on the three dots to bring up the Delete option - Delete the Override on a different client or tell another User to do so - Observe
